Title: Kotatsu Neko
Description: ['A lazy cat sits comfortably under the "kotatsu", a low table with a heater used in Japan to keep warm during winter. What will he do when he realizes the remote control of his TV is out of reach? ']
Related: ['Adaptation: Shounen Ashibe', 'Alternative version: Shounen Ashibe (TV)', 'Prequel: Shounen Ashibe: Go! Go! Goma-chan 2', 'Sequel: Shounen Ashibe: Go! Go! Goma-chan 4']
